bibl.title: Earth, Wind, and Fire: The Alexandrian Fire-storm of 48 B.C.
bibl.note: Was the Great Library damaged or destroyed as a result of the Bellum Alexandrinum, when Julius Caesar set afire the Egyptian fleet in the Eastern Harbour?

bibl.title: What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria?

bibl.seg: CHERF William J., Earth, Wind, and Fire: The Alexandrian Fire-storm of 48 B.C.

Mostafa EL-ABBADI and Omnia Mounir FATHALLAH (Edd.), What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria? = Library of the Written Word. 3. The Manuscript World. 1 (Leiden - Boston, 2008) pp. 55-73, 1 tabl.
Was the Great Library damaged or destroyed as a result of the Bellum Alexandrinum, when Julius Caesar set afire the Egyptian fleet in the Eastern Harbour?
